The Micro Irrigation systems give irrigation efficiency as high as 80%-90% in case of drip irrigation and 60%-70% in case of sprinkler irrigation in comparison to normal irrigation's efficiency of 30%-40%.

Punjab Government has been providing total assistance @ 80% of actual market cost of Micro Irrigation to farmers.

Additional top-up subsidy over and above PMKSY has been provided out of ‘Project for Promotion of Micro Irrigation (NABARD-RIDF-20)’.

Additional 10% subsidy is also provided to Women, Small/Marginal and SC farmers. There is no maximum ceiling of area.
